Phil White writes:
> Now I have a bunch of ARC files.  It'd be easy enough to write a diff 
> between them, but what I'd really like is to have Heritrix watch the 
> sites over a period of days and download new pages in addition to what I 
> already have.
>
> Is there a way to do that?

No, there isn't. Scan through the mailing list archives for the
subject "recraw" [sic].
